attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: School Attendance is falling all the time..And so far no solution has been obtained..Is it not time to consider that not all children are going to be interested in the normal school carriculum, English, Maths, Art, etc and are not academic..but could be, with training, masters in Plumbing, Joinery, mechanics, and other manual work..Could it be time to give a child facing high school (by which time basic Maths & English will have been taught) the option of a regular school or a new venture school where such manual subjects could be taught ?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
